text: Gladstone Apartments is a historic apartment building in Nashville, Tennessee, U.S.. It was built in 1923 for Morris Fisher, a developer, and it was designed by architect Charles Ferguson. It has been listed on the National Register of Historic Places since June 16, 1983. ==References== Category:Residential buildings on the National Register of Historic Places in Tennessee Category:Neoclassical architecture in Tennessee Category:Residential buildings completed in 1923 Category:Buildings and structures in Nashville, Tennessee
title: Gladstone Apartments
